channel.title: Animations of NPCs seem to 'stick' and then smudge.... o_O
channel.description:
Okay, not the best description every, but that is why internet created pictures.
If you look at A) Thats me attacking the goblin, and everytime it attacks it does that wierd.. looking smudge animation type of thing.
Now... look at B) When I am NOT attacking it, it looks normal.
This happens to some other random NPCS as well..
Whats wrong? I am so confuseeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeed. D;
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/638251/AandBgoblin.png[/img]

item.title: Animations of NPCs seem to 'stick' and then smudge.... o_O
item.dc:creator: @WolfPK WolfPK
item.description:
@WolfPK wrote:

[quote=“icereign2, post:6, topic:344414”][quote author=WolfPK link=topic=440792.msg3238901#msg3238901 date=1276730853]

The Npc needs to be Animated brah, search Model Section

Search the Model section? Okay…

and what am I looking for >_>

this is normal btw…
an attack animation

…

Your dumb bro.

I fixed it anyways.

thanks.
[/quote]

ur an idiot it didnt have a attack animation rtd why do u think he said its normal just need attack animation rtd…[/quote]

oops. Read it wrong, sorry.

Thanks.

Read full topic
